name: Alumnay
tag_list: south-africa, social-network, e-commerce, social-commerce, shopping-online, online-stores, auctions, business-directory
overview:
Alumnay (Pty) Limited is a privately owned South Africa Web company whose vision is to become Africa’s leading and world class eCommerce company. It was incorporated in February 2012 as a private company, with its headquarters in Houghton, Gauteng, South Africa.

The company has been refocused over the past year as an electronic commerce specialist, focusing on internet platforms in multiple markets.

The company has established a portfolio of divisions in the internet industry that principally covers Networking platforms, Online marketplace websites, Niche job websites, Online classifieds, Online retailing and Comparison & reviewing websites. The company’s operations and businesses are principally in South Africa

Specialties eCommerce, Networking platforms, Free online classifieds, Consumer-to-consumer trading platforms, Niche job boards, Online Retailing, Online Comparison & Reviewing platforms
